<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間がより延長</COL>
column4:
Increases physical attack temporarily after
breaking enemy guard.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases effect
duration.</COL>

column3:
えぐり突きのダメージ量が増加する
<COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加
LV5～6で気絶攻力が増加</COL>
column4:
Increases the damage of Gouge.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases damage.
LV5～6: Increases stun power.</COL>
